mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO system_log_archived ( id, log_time, log_type, task_id, task_name, device_id, device_name, pool_id, pool_name, log_level, content ) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.logTime}, #{item.logType}, #{item.taskId}, #{item.taskName}, #{item.deviceId}, #{item.deviceName}, #{item.poolId}, #{item.poolName}, #{item.logLevel}, #{item.content})
